channel.title: Multi Magic for npcs (PI)
channel.description:
Well, im trying to make it so an Non-Playable-Char can use mage attacks (hits multiple people)
I thought of npcs that used magic/meele and thought of jad, searched his id in npchandler, but couldnt find much, just found some cases of whether hes aggressive or not, and i think some other cases, but i couldnt find anything related to his magic/range attack, all i could find is hitdiff if protect from meele is active.
Can someone help me with this? And i also found this: [code]public boolean switchesAttackers(int i) { switch(npcs[i].npcType) {[/code]
It doesnt have to do with my problem, but a different question, my guess is that obviously it switches attackers to npcs declared in this boolean by case ****: right? Because some times methods arent what they seem, just want to make sure.
And to clear another thing up, AttackType 1 is meele, 2 is mage, and 3 is range?
Also, could someone explain to me what "R3" is?
I tried looking through classes to find it and maybe understand it, but i cant seem to find it...

item.title: Multi Magic for npcs (PI)
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Mendorphins:

You do a Misc.random(2). if (Misc.random == 1) {}, if (Misc.random == 2){}, but I don’t know where lol.

Thanks for your help men, but i actually tried to figure that one out (and i did! :D) but thanks for taking your time anyways!

item.title: Multi Magic for npcs (PI)
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Thanks vain, ill look through this and see how it goes.

It worked! He does the damage, the the projectile gfx works, the ending gfx works,

But the npc only uses that type of damage, do i need to declare something else to make it use meele as well?

Also, it follows me around when it uses that attack

Read full topic

Mendorphins:

If this still goes unanswered tomorrow morning, I’ll have a look. Because I got my Elfs shooting Crystal bow arrows successfully, so is pretty much the same thing. It’s in NPCHandler I reckon, but I’m just off to bed - 3am.

Thanks, ill keep looking, ill find it eventually, if not, anyone’s help is appreciated.

Well, im trying to make it so an Non-Playable-Char can use mage attacks (hits multiple people)

I thought of npcs that used magic/meele and thought of jad, searched his id in npchandler, but couldnt find much, just found some cases of whether hes aggressive or not, and i think some other cases, but i couldnt find anything related to his magic/range attack, all i could find is hitdiff if protect from meele is active.
